Gatekeeper Illiyana: This place has been a strategic center for politics, economics and military operations for the northern part of this continent. This is even more true with the rise of Elmore. Every day, several hundred people enter and leave this village through us, the Gatekeepers. What brings you to Rune Castle Town?
